channel.title: FFXIV Lodestone updates (all)
channel.description: FFXIV Lodestone updates (all) - Powered by RSSHub

item.title: Patch 7.2─Seekers of Eternity Special Site Updated!
item.description: The Patch 7.2 special site has been updated with details of the fighters seeking glory in the Arcadion: Cruiserweight Division, the Inconceivably Further Hildibrand Adventures, and a host of new screenshots. View the special site.

item.title: FINAL FANTASY XIV Patch 7.2 Fan Kit Released!
item.description: We’ve released a new fan kit featuring artwork from Patch 7.2─Seekers of Eternity. Download the fan kit.

item.title: [Elemental] Recovery from Kujata World Technical Difficulties (Mar. 17)
Join us for Duty Commenced on March 19!
item.description: The next episode of Duty Commenced, the North American Community team's live show, is set for Wednesday, March 19. Join the Community team while they recap more information on Patch 7.2 from the latest Letter from the Producer LIVE. As always, there will be a showcase of the latest entries for Community Commendations and giveaways! Read on for details.

item.title: Introducing the FINAL FANTASY XIV Edition Classic TKL from NovelKeys
item.description: We are pleased to announce a special collaboration with NovelKeys, an artisan keyboard company that focuses on creating quality keyboards and keyboard associated products. The FFXIV Edition Classic TKL is a fully prebuilt, custom mechanical keyboard that’s ready to go out of the box but is infinitely customizable with a myriad of included goodies. The FFXIV Edition Classic TKL includes gold Eorzean sublegends on the alphanumeric keys, 22 job icon keycaps, 5 adorable minion novelty keycaps, a 16-stack vulnerability up keycap, various job-colored modifier keys, and several extra FFXIV-themed keys. Read on for details.

item.title: Patch 7.2─Seekers of Eternity Special Site Updated!
item.description: The Patch 7.2 special site has been updated with screenshots depicting the latest in Everkeep entertainment─the Arcadion: Cruiserweight Division, along with new details on the lush environs awaiting players upon the Occult Crescent! And for keen Disciples of the Hand and Land, we’ve included updates on the collaborative spaceward endeavors of Cosmic Exploration, as well as the upcoming gatherer-focused Mamool Ja society quests charting a brand-new chapter for Mamook. View the special site.

item.title: Actions Taken Against In-Game RMT & Other Illicit Activities (Mar. 13)
From Screenshots to Snapshots! FFXIV x instax™ Collaboration!
item.description:
Hello! This is Hira from the Promo team.
The FINAL FANTASY XIV x instax™ collaboration is here!

item.title: Letter from the Producer LIVE Part LXXXVI Airs Friday, March 14
item.description: The next Letter from the Producer LIVE broadcast is set to air on Friday, March 14 at 3:00 a.m. (PDT). Don’t miss out!

item.title: Crystalline Conflict Season Thirteen Ending Soon!
item.description: The competition has been fierce, but Season Thirteen of Crystalline Conflict will soon draw to a close with the beginning of Patch 7.2 maintenance. Once the season has ended, players will receive rewards according to their overall rank and tier within each physical data center. * As of Season Twelve, the number of ranking players to receive rewards has been increased from 100 to 300 in the Japanese, North American, and European data centers. No changes have been made to the Oceanian data center. * Players must participate in at least one ranked match during the season in order to receive tier rewards. The final results will be announced following the release of Patch 7.2, so give it your all and prove yourself the fiercest fighter on the crystal line! Please note that in light of current matchmaking conditions, we've made some adjustments to the lower and upper limits within which competitors are matched in Japanese data centers. Best of luck, and happy battling! View the Crystalline Conflict Rankings page.

item.title: PvP Series 7 Ends Soon
item.description: PvP Series 7 will draw to a close with the release of Patch 7.2. Furthermore, series rewards will be updated at the start of Series 8, so be sure not to leave any malmstone unturned! Read on for details.

item.title: New Merchandise Available for Pre-order!
item.description: We are now accepting pre-orders for new FINAL FANTASY XIV merchandise! Our latest additions are the light-up regulator accessory and a sleek messenger bag with a reflective decal!

item.title: New Optional Items & Limited-time Sale!
item.description: New optional items will be added to the FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Store starting Monday, March 10 around 1:00 a.m. (PDT). We're also hosting a Little Ladies' Day sale for a limited time, so don't miss out on some exclusive deals! Visit the FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Store. * The items featured above will be available for purchase after the scheduled maintenance ends on Monday, March 10 around 1:00 a.m. (PDT). Please visit the News section for detailed maintenance information. * Please note that there may be a delay in the delivery of items directly after sales commence due to congestion of the delivery system.

item.title: [Crystal] Recovery from Brynhildr World Technical Difficulties (Mar. 6)
Patch 7.2─Seekers of Eternity Special Site Now Live
item.description: The special site for Patch 7.2─Seekers of Eternity is now live! Take a peek at what awaits you in the main scenario, new dungeon “The Underkeep,” and new trial “Recollection.” We’ll keep updating the special site with the latest information on Patch 7.2, so be sure to stay tuned! View the special site.

item.title: Actions Taken Against In-Game RMT & Other Illicit Activities (Mar. 6)
[Primal] Recovery from Leviathan World Technical Difficulties (Mar. 1)
A Seneschal Function for All!
item.description:
Greetings everyone, this is Sicycre from the Community team! 
The flowery season of spring is just around the corner, and we're about to see some cherry blossoms in Eorzea as well. That's right! Our next seasonal event is Little Ladies' Day!

item.title: Letter from the Producer LIVE Part LXXXVI Set for March 14
item.description: The next Letter from the Producer LIVE will bring you the latest gameplay and information on Patch 7.2─Seekers of Eternity, scheduled to release in late March!

item.title: Upcoming Changes to Allagan Tomestones
item.description: Patch 7.2 will see several changes to Allagan tomestones, including the removal of Allagan tomestones of causality and Allagan tomestones of comedy.

item.title: Actions Taken Against In-Game RMT & Other Illicit Activities (Feb. 27)
THE PRIMALS Live in Japan – Darkest Before Dawn Digital Album Precedes Its Blu-ray Release!
item.description: THE PRIMALS’ largest concert yet, held at Yokohama Arena, can now be downloaded as high-resolution audio ahead of its Blu-ray release. Rock out to this unforgettable live concert today!

item.title: FINAL FANTASY XIV Fan Kit Updated!
item.description: The following icons have been updated to reflect Patch 7.1:

item.title: Patch 7.18 Notes
item.description: The notes for Patch 7.18 are now available, and include details on the removal of the weekly restrictions in AAC Light-heavyweight Tier (Savage), PvP action adjustments, and a number of resolved issues. Read the patch notes.

item.title: Crystalline Conflict Community Cup 2025 (Europe) Streaming Details & Brackets
item.description: Brace yourselves for riveting matches in the 2025 edition of the European Crystalline Conflict Community Cup! Discover the teams that will be fighting for a spot in the Round of 8 to reach the live streamed phase of the showdown on Friday, March 7! Click here for more details.

item.title: Announcing the Crystalline Conflict Community Cup 2025 North America!
item.description: Are you ready to show your mettle in the ring? We are holding an online PvP tournament featuring Crystalline Conflict and are inviting all who are eager to take on fierce competitors within North America! If you're on one of the North American data centers, such as Aether, Crystal, Dynamis, or Primal, gather up your team members and register for this upcoming tournament for a chance to win exciting prizes! Read on for details.

item.title: Little Ladies' Day Begins March 3!
item.description: The festivities of Little Ladies' Day are upon us once more! The streets of Ul'dah are festooned with the usual decorations, and a now-familiar stage dominates one of the city's main thoroughfares. This year, however, the Royal Seneschal has plans to enliven the celebrations with the debut of a brand new performer...

item.title: Letter from the Producer LIVE Part LXXXV Digest Released
item.description: We’re pleased to announce that the Letter from the Producer LIVE Part LXXXV event digest has been released! If you weren’t able to watch the live stream, or if you just want to watch it again, be sure to check it out! Proceed to the thread.

A Bouquet's the Way for Valentione's Day
item.description:
Lali-ho! This is Kiwikopo from the Community team~ o/
Hope you've all been staying warm (unless, of course, you're a Warrior of Light from the southern hemisphere) and that it hasn't been too chilly. The temperature here is pretty frosty and hasn't been particularly kind to my fingertips, so I'm typing this while enjoying a hearty cuppa - a guaranteed way to warm both your fingers and heart!

Actions Taken Against In-Game RMT & Other Illicit Activities (Jan. 16)
Mister Foxclon's Neighborhood Recap! (Dec. 2024)
item.description:
Greetings everyone, this is Voltenyne from the Community team! 
I'm back with the latest recap of Mister Foxclon's Neighborhood, the housing tour series presented by Global Community Producer Toshio "Foxclon" Murouchi! The broadcast series aims to bring attention to the wonderful housing designs created by our player community, so we hope you'll come take a look at what your fellow housing enthusiasts have been up to!

item.title: Temporary Suspension of Automatic Housing Demolition
Actions Taken Against In-Game RMT & Other Illicit Activities (Jan. 9)
FINAL FANTASY XIV Materials Usage License Revised
Tsuchinoko Noko Noko Heavensturn Turn
item.description:
Season's scree-tings, everyone! This is Chesskyth from the Community team!
We're almost at the end of 2024 already - it's hard to believe it was six whole months ago that we first set sail for the shores of Tural.

item.title: Actions Taken Against In-Game RMT & Other Illicit Activities (Dec. 26)
FINAL FANTASY XIV Materials Usage License Revised
Bringing Starlight Celebration Tidings to One and All!
item.description:
Hello! This is Minaryne from the Community team!
Happy Starlight Celebration to one and all!

item.title: Mister Foxclon's Neighborhood Airs December 20!
item.description:
Greetings everyone, this is Voltenyne from the Community team! 
The next episode of our housing showcase stream, Mister Foxclon's Neighborhood, will be airing on Friday, December 20!

item.title: All You Gotta Do Is Just Meet Me at PAX Aus 2024
item.description:
Lali-ho! Kiwikopo here, reporting in with stories from the team's adventures in the wonderful land of Oz--I mean Australia--this year.
We attended both Melbourne International Games Week and PAX Australia in early October, and for the first time in a decade, a few members of the Development team also flew over from Japan to join us in celebrating FFXIV in the land Down Under.

item.title: Community Spotlight: Littlejem
item.description:
Scree-tings, one and all! This is the Community team reporting in with our next Community Spotlight~
Any Warriors of Light out there who attended the Fan Festival 2023 in London or tuned in online will surely remember Yoshi-P's iconic entrance onto the stage dressed in a viper costume.

item.title: You Think I'm Going to Fall for an Illusion?!
item.description:
Hello everyone, this is Pumpkin Spicycre from the Community team!
The fall weather really swooped in once we neared October! Seems like just several days ago, we were still wearing summer clothing and complaining about the heat; that's all gone as if it were simply an illusion!

item.title: Gamescom 2024 & Cologne Fan Celebration Recap
item.description:
Hello, everyone!
This is Vystenya, Chesskyth, and Alevercey from the EU Community team, back with a special recap for gamescom 2024.

item.title: Journey (PAX) West, unto Tural!
item.description:
Hello, everyone! 
Ali here from the FFXIV Marketing team! I'm so excited to be back with another recap, this time for PAX West 2024! As we journeyed west to Tural, so too did we journey west to Seattle, Washington to bring exciting activities to our Warriors of Light! I'm also thrilled to be joined by Francis from the Marketing team and Minaryne from the Community team who will help me paint the picture of PAX West as beautifully as any pictomancer...

item.title: Community Spotlight: Hector Hectorson
item.description:
Greetings, Warriors of Light!
Have you ever stepped into extreme or savage duties in FINAL FANTASY XIV? If so, do you prefer progressing through the fight without any hints, or would you look to consult a guide?

item.title: An Anniversary Rising
item.description:
Ohokaliy! It's Kiwikopo from the Community team~ 
Have you been enjoying the Moonfire Faire? If you have yet to partake in the summery festivities, you'll have until Monday, August 26 at 7:59 a.m. (PDT) to complete the event quest and receive the Uchiwasshoi emote. Don't forget to give the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course a go as well, I promise the view is worth it!

item.title: "Give it All" in the Arcadion!
item.description:
Hello, Warriors of Light!   I'm Francis from the Marketing team, and like many of you I have been enraptured by "Give it All," the song that plays during the battle against Wicked Thunder in the Arcadion. 
The song's vocals were performed by Chrissy Costanza, lead vocalist for the popular rock band Against the Current, who worked in close collaboration with Masayoshi Soken and THE PRIMALS. Chrissy was amazing to work with and her distinct rock vocals really turn up the energy and electrify the atmosphere during battle!

item.title: It's a Party: EU Fan Gathering Recap!
item.description:
Greetings! This is Vystenya, Chesskyth, and Kiwikopo from the EU Community team, reporting in from London HQ with a special blog on our latest Fan Gatherings in Europe!
It's been a while since we've hosted some get-togethers with our players, and with several major events happening this year, we thought it would be a great opportunity to put the wheels back in motion.

item.title: Waving Away the Heat This Moonfire Faire
item.description:
Greetings! 
Sicycre from the Community team here.

item.title: Community Spotlight: Elunia Arlana of Team Hopeless
item.description:
Greetings one and all!
Our next community spotlight features Elunia Arlana of Team Hopeless. PvP fans will of course remember this team as the victors of the Crystalline Conflict Regional Championship 2023 in Europe and Oceania that took place at London Fan Festival!

item.title: Gettin' Jiggly with It
item.description:
Hello, everyone!
This is Sicycre from the Community team.

item.title: Look at Me, I'm the Kappa Now
item.description:
Greetings, this is Voltenyne from the Community team!
Something tells me you could use a break from FATEs. So settle in, and it'll be my pleasure to present a preview of the upcoming Make It Rain Campaign!
